main event: Three UFO objects were spotted in the sky near Glenmora, Louisiana on August 4, 1965.
interesting points: The objects resembled meteors in appearance, with a white-blue color like a welder's torch.
The objects were observed for only about 5 seconds, with no sound or trail observed.
The objects were estimated to be at an altitude of 1 mile and traveling at a speed of 25 to 100 yards per second.
Two of the objects were heading northwest-southeast, while the other two were heading southeast, with the latter group appearing about 5 minutes after the first.
The report concludes that the objects were likely related to a meteor shower event.
